<rule id="javaee-to-jakarta-namespaces-00030" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <filecontent filename="{*}.xml" pattern="persistence_2_1.xsd"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace the Java EE XSD with the Jakarta equivalent">
                    <message>Replace `persistence_2_1.xsd` with `persistence_3_0.xsd` and update the version attribute to `"3.0"`</message>
                    <link href="https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/jakartaee/#9" title="Jakarta XML Schemas"/>
                    <quickfix name="javaee-namespaces-replace-persistence_2_1-xsd" type="REPLACE">
                        <replacement>persistence_3_0.xsd</replacement>
                        <search>persistence_2_1.xsd</search>
                    </quickfix>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
